svg.text: Recursive Hierarchical Clustering + Small Model Summaries + Claude Code Dedup/Merge + Agent Skills Report Generation

g.text: Load source data files (multiple initial categories)
Conservative HDBSCAN to generate L1 clusters
Generate summaries for all L0 clusters
Trace back to source for full fields:
Date, headline, country, source, quality score
Same source + same date + similar title = same event
Use metadata to identify same events
Full embedding, no sampling - preserves semantic integrity
Conservative recursive clustering - larger clusters, better coherence
Small model summaries - low cost, fast processing (Qwen3-30B)
On-demand metadata retrieval - avoid redundant storage
Parallel processing - max 10 Claude agents running simultaneously
Termination condition ensures all clusters fit small model context (10K input limit)
Small models for summaries reduce costs
Claude only for final classification, high ROI
Recursive clustering handles any data volume
Human review rules embedded in classification logic
10 Task agents running simultaneously for speed
Full embedding + recursive clustering, no data dropped
